post:
Hi guys! We just have our new server up and running with Quadranet today. So gonna do some good deals on our current Windows VPS!

##Some rules:
- Discount **only applies to US-CA-2G package**, if you want to upgrade to higher ones, it will no longer applied.
- Discount is **recurring**.
- Limited quantity: 30.
- Offer is available until **31st Mar** or **while stocks last**

##Features:
- All price already had both Windows 2012 R2 and 2016 License **included**.
- **Hyper-V** based virtualization: boost performance of your Windows VPS by 20-30% compared with KVM.
- Powered by **enterprise NVMe** (ReFS + RAID 1).
- Nightly backup available for free of charge (not available for requests).
- Locations: **Los Angeles, California, US** (Quadranet).
- Accepting Paypal, Cryptocurrency, Perfect money.

##OFFERS:

<pre>
1 Unlimited vCore
2 GB RAM
25 GB NVMe
Unmetered Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps
1 Dedicated IP
Licensed Windows 2012 R2 - 2016
</pre>
**Monthly:** $5
**Order link:**  https://billing.hyonix.com/order/config/index/vps/?group_id=14&pricing_id=96 (Coupon: IDLEWINDOWS)


##Test IP:
- Los Angeles, California, US (Quadranet).: 185.244.38.254

##Host node specification:
- Dual E5-2670v2
- 192 GB RAM DDR3
- 2 x P3700 2TB in RAID 1

##More:
- About us: https://hyonix.com/about-us
- Terms of services: https://hyonix.com/tos
- Acceptable Usage Policy (AUP): https://hyonix.com/aup
- Privacy Policy: https://hyonix.com/privacy
- Network Uptime: https://status.hyonix.com/

Feel free to ask us any question via LET PMs, Live Chat, [Ticket](https://billing.hyonix.com/client/plugin/support_manager/client_tickets/add/4/)
